Specifies that an existing storage account to be attached with the batch account.

public Microsoft.Azure.Management.Batch.Fluent.BatchAccount.Update.IUpdate WithExistingStorageAccount (Microsoft.Azure.Management.Storage.Fluent.IStorageAccount storageAccount);

storageAccount existing storage account to be used

Returns
